ygData.messageBody:
The thing is, if you charm a mob and it does too much damage, it will take a large amount of exp from the group. No matter how many people there are in the group.
----- Original Message -----
From: Matt DeBarger
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, May 14, 2001 10:06 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Charm Change


Enchanter charm can't be refreshed, unless it has been changed recently. At
higher levels, mobs do WAY more damage than PC's. A bard could easily
outdamage a monk or rogue with refreshable charm. Mana would not be a real
issue, just sit down and med between battles. With non refreshable charm,
I'm convinced if Verant saw a good charming bard in action, they would nerf
it. To eliminate the only real downside to charm, would be too much.

We'll disagree on this, no biggie :) A lot of people don't agree with me on
how powerful charm is. There won't be any changing my mind now though,
since I can't use it anymore :( You know if you charm a spectral curate in
KC, and you have people low on health, he'll probably heal them? Try it
some time, will freak out your cleric...

Elfson Allegro 55 Veeshan
